Subject: Upgrade failure
Description:
Hi,

I am attempting to upgrade the virtual appliance of Endpoint Protector from version 5.9.4.0 - 5.9.4.1 and get an error message when the upgrade is underway.
The message says "some problems occured during installation. Please contact support. (Error 2 - Number of maximum retries for this update reached, skipping this update)"
Solution_Comment__c: The customer cleared the error by reverting to a previous snapshot
